locations.description:
Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit"https://sebt.ohio.gov/apply/
Go to https://apply.mrelief.com/screener or text "Food" to 74544 to check eligibility.

locations.name: Shipt Online Service
locations.description:
Get $4.99/month Shipt membership with SNAP EBT.

Step 1: Add your EBT card. In the Shipt app, click Account, then Payments, then Add Card. Voila.

Step 2: Shop EBT-eligible items. Eligible items are searchable in the app, and you'll also see them tagged while browsing.

Step 3: Check out. Use your EBT card for eligible items, and another card for everything else.
